00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"

00046 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 typedef enum {Fail = 0, Pass = !Fail} TestResult;
00048 
00049 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 #define BufferSize        4
00051 
00052 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 void SPI_Configuration(void);
00054 void SPI_Loopback(void);
00055 
00056 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength);
00057 
00058 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 u8 SPI0_Buffer_Tx[BufferSize] = {0x11, 0x22, 0x44, 0x88};
00060 u8 SPI1_Buffer_Tx[BufferSize] = {0x88, 0x44, 0x22, 0x11};
00061 u8 SPI0_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize] = {0};
00062 u8 SPI1_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize] = {0};
00063 vu8 SPI0_Tx_Index = 0, SPI1_Tx_Index = 0, SPI0_Rx_Index = 0, SPI1_Rx_Index = 0;
00064 
00065 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00067   * @brief  Main program.
00068   * @retval None
00069   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00070 int main(void)
00071 {
00072   /* Initialize LED1 & LED2 on HT32 board                                                                   */
00073   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00074   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00075 
00076   SPI_Configuration();
00077 
00078   SPI_Loopback();
00079 
00080   while (1);
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00084   * @brief  Configure the SPI ports.
00085   * @retval None
00086   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00087 void SPI_Configuration(void)
00088 {
00089   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00090      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00091      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00092   */
00093   SPI_InitTypeDef SPI_InitStructure;
00094 
00095   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00096   /* Enable Px, Master, Slave  & AFIO clock                                                                 */
00097   HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SEL_GPIO_CLOCK(CKCUClock)         = 1;
00098   HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_CLOCK(CKCUClock)                   = 1;
00099   HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_CLOCK(CKCUClock)                  = 1;
00100   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                                 = 1;
00101   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00102 
00103   /* MASTER_SEL idle state is HIGH                                                                            */
00104   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SEL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SEL_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00105 
00106   /* Configure related IO to Master mode                                                                      */
00107   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SEL_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SEL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00108   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SCK_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_SCK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00109   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_MOSI_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00110   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_MISO_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_MISO_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00111 
00112   /* Configure related IO to Slave mode                                                                      */
00113   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_SEL_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_SEL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00114   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_SCK_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_SCK_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00115   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_MOSI_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00116   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_MISO_AFIO_PORT, HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_MISO_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SPI);
00117 
00118   /* SPI configuration: Master mode                                                                        */
00119   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_MASTER;
00120   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_DISABLE;
00121   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
00122   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_HARDWARE;
00123   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
00124   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_LOW;
00125   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_FIRST;
00126   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
00127   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00128   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00129   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 4;
00130   SPI_Init(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER, &SPI_InitStructure);
00131 
00132   /* SPI1 configuration: Slave mode                                                                         */
00133   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_SLAVE;
00134   SPI_Init(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE, &SPI_InitStructure);
00135 
00136   /* Set SEL as output mode for slave select                                                                */
00137   SPI_SELOutputCmd(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER, ENABLE);
00138 
00139   /* Enable SPI1 TXBE & RXBNE interrupt                                                                     */
00140   SPI_IntConfig(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE, SPI_INT_TXBE | SPI_INT_RXBNE, ENABLE);
00141   /* Enable SPI0 TXBE & RXBNE interrupt                                                                     */
00142   SPI_IntConfig(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER, SPI_INT_TXBE | SPI_INT_RXBNE, ENABLE);
00143 
00144   /* Configure and enable master interrupt                                                                  */
00145   NVIC_SetPriority(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_IRQn, 1);
00146   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER_IRQn);
00147 
00148   /* Configure and enable slave interrupt                                                                   */
00149   NVIC_SetPriority(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_IRQn, 0);
00150   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE_IRQn);
00151 
00152   /* Enable slave first                                                                                     */
00153   SPI_Cmd(HTCFG_SPI_SLAVE, ENABLE);
00154   /* Enable master later                                                                                    */
00155   SPI_Cmd(HTCFG_SPI_MASTER, ENABLE);
00156 }
00157 
00158 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00159   * @brief  The SPI send data.
00160   * @retval None
00161   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00162 void SPI_Loopback(void)
00163 {
00164   /* Wait for transmission finished                                                                         */
00165   while (SPI0_Rx_Index < BufferSize);
00166 
00167   /* Check on validity of received data on SPI0 & SPI1                                                      */
00168   if (CmpBuffer(SPI0_Buffer_Tx, SPI1_Buffer_Rx, BufferSize) && CmpBuffer(SPI1_Buffer_Tx, SPI0_Buffer_Rx, BufferSize))
00169   {
00170     /* Turn on LED1 if the transmitted and received data are equal                                          */
00171     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00172   }
00173   else
00174   {
00175     /* Turn on LED2 if the transmitted and received data are different                                      */
00176     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00177   }
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00181   * @brief  Compare two buffers.
00182   * @param  Buffer1, Buffer2: buffers to be compared.
00183   * @param  BufferLength: buffer's length
00184   * @retval None
00185   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00186 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength)
00187 {
00188   while (BufferLength--)
00189   {
00190     if (*Buffer1 != *Buffer2)
00191     {
00192       return Fail;
00193     }
00194 
00195     Buffer1++;
00196     Buffer2++;
00197   }
00198 
00199   return Pass;
00200 }

00202 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00203 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00204   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00205   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00206   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00207   * @retval None
00208   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00209 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00210 {
00211   /*
00212      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00213      Debug message can be added here.
00214      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00215   */
00216 
00217   while (1)
00218   {
00219   }
00220 }
00221 #endif
